content.eamr: ( ing-0 "2 quarts water" )
( ing-1 "12 ounces beef shank" )
( ing-2 "2 large onions, chopped" )
( ing-3 "2 large carrots, sliced" )
( ing-4 "1 rutabaga, diced" )
( ing-5 "salt and pepper to taste" )
( ing-6 "4 potatoes, peeled and quartered" )
( ing-7 "2 leeks, sliced" )
( ing-8 "1 small head cabbage, sliced" )
( ing-9 "2 tablespoons chopped fresh parsley" )

content.text: 0) Bring water to boil in a large pot.
1) Place beef shank in, and simmer 1 1/2 hours.
3) Lift meat out, trim off gristle and cut meat into medium sized pieces; set aside.
4) Skim fat from surface of stock, or strain through a fine sieve.
5) Return stock to heat, and bring to a boil.

content.eamr:
( inst-6 / R
	:inform ( ac-6-0 "Add"@3:6 / AC
		:ppt ( ing-2 "onions"@7:13 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-3 "carrots"@15:22 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-4 "rutabaga"@27:35 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( NULL / FOOD )
	)
)

content.text: 9) Add potatoes, and simmer until tender, 15 to 20 minutes.
content.eamr:
( inst-9 / R
	:inform ( ac-9-0 "Add"@4:7 / AC
		:ppt ( ing-6 "potatoes"@8:16 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( NULL / FOOD )
	)
	:inform ( ac-9-1 "simmer"@22:28 / AC
		:until ( cond-9-0 "until tender"@29:41 / CONDITION_CLAUSE )
		:duration ( dur-9-0 "15 to 20 minutes"@43:59 / DUR )
		:ppt ( NULL / FOOD )
	)
)

content.text: 10) Stir in the leeks, cabbage, parsley and reserved meat.
content.eamr:
( inst-10 / R
	:inform ( ac-10-0 "Stir in"@4:11 / AC
		:ppt ( ing-7 "the leeks"@12:21 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-8 "cabbage"@23:30 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-9 "parsley"@32:39 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( "reserved meat"@44:57 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( NULL / FOOD )
	)
)

content.text: 11) Simmer 10 minutes, or until cabbage is tender.
content.eamr:
( inst-11 / R
	:inform ( ac-11-0 "Simmer"@4:10 / AC
		:duration ( dur-11-0 "10 minutes"@11:21 / DUR )
		:until ( cond-11-0 "until cabbage is tender"@26:49 / CONDITION_CLAUSE )
		:ppt ( NULL / FOOD )
	)
)
